obfuscation: Aye , it 's the punishment o ' God on him .
original: Aye, it's the punishment o' God on him.

obfuscation: Did ye ever hear of a man who was n't crazy do the things he does ?
original:
Did ye ever hear of
a man who wasn't crazy do the things he does?

obfuscation: Who but a man that 's brainsick would take his woman -- and as sweet a woman as ever was -- on a rotten whalin ' ship to the Arctic seas to be locked in by the ice for nigh on a year , and maybe lose her senses forever -- for it 's sure she 'll never be the same again .
original:
Who but a man that's mad would take his woman--and as sweet a
woman as ever was--on a rotten whalin' ship to the Arctic seas to be
locked in by the ice for nigh on a year, and maybe lose her senses
forever--for it's sure she'll never be the same again.

obfuscation: She useter be awful decent to me before -- she got -- like she is .
original: She useter be awful nice to me before--she got--like she is.

obfuscation: Aye , she was full to all of us .
original: Aye, she was good to all of us.

obfuscation: 'Twould have been hell on board without her ; for he 's a hard man -- a hard , hard man -- a driver if there ever was one .
original:
'Twould have been hell on
board without her; for he's a hard man--a hard, hard man--a driver if
there ever was one.

obfuscation: I hope he 's satisfied nowadays -- drivin ' her on till she 's near lost her mind .
original:
I hope he's satisfied
now--drivin' her on till she's near lost her mind.

obfuscation: And who could blame her ?
original:
And who could blame
her?

obfuscation: 'T is a God 's wonder we 're not a ship full of crazed people -- with the ice all the time , and the quiet thus thick you 're afraid to hear your own voice .
original:
'Tis a God's wonder we're not a ship full of crazed people--with
the ice all the time, and the quiet so thick you're afraid to hear your
own voice.

obfuscation: She don't never speak to me no more -- jest looks at me 's if she did n't know me .
original:
She don't
never speak to me no more--jest looks at me 's if she didn't know me.

obfuscation: She make n't know no one -- but him .
original: She don't know no one--but him.

obfuscation: She talks to him -- when she does speak -- right enough .
original:
She talks to him--when she
does talk--right enough.

obfuscation: She does nothin ' all day long nowadays but sit and sew -- and then she cries to herself without makin ' no noise .
original:
She does nothin' all day long now but sit and sew--and then she
cries to herself without makin' no noise.

obfuscation: I 've seen her .
original: I've seen her.

obfuscation: Aye , I could hear her through the door a while back .
original: Aye, I could hear her through the door a while back.

obfuscation: She 's cryin ' nowadays .
original: She's cryin' now.

obfuscation: God send his soul to hell for the devil he is !
original:
God send his soul to hell
for the devil he is!

obfuscation: 'Twould be like hitting a worm .
original:
'Twould
be like hitting a worm.

obfuscation: It is nigh on two bells , Mr .
original: It is nigh on two bells, Mr.

obfuscation: Steward , and this truck not cleared yet .
original:
Steward, and this
truck not cleared yet.

obfuscation: Y-y-yes , sir .
original: Y-y-yes, sir.
